00009         class DBConn

00016

00039                 public function connect()
00040                 {
00041                         if (!is_resource($this->link) || get_resource_type($this->link) != "mysql link")
00042                         {
00043                                 $this->link = mysql_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USER, DB_PASS);
00044                                 mysql_select_db(DB_NAME) or die("Cannot connect: " . mysql_error());
00045                         }
00046                 }
00047                 
00053                 public function select_db($database_name)
00054                 {
00055                         $this->connect();
00056                         return mysql_select_db($database_name, $this->link);
00057                 }
00058                 
00063                 public function close()
00064                 {
00065                         mysql_close($this->link);
00066                 }

00073                 public function prepare($query)
00074                 {
00075                         $this->connect();
00076                         
00077                         $args = func_get_args();
00078                         $args_len = func_num_args();
00079                         if ($args_len > 1)
00080                         {
00081                                 for ($i = 1; $i < $args_len; $i++)
00082                                 {
00083                                         $query = preg_replace("/\{$i\}/", mysql_real_escape_string($args[$i], $this->link), $query, 1);
00084                                 }
00085                         }
00086                         $this->query = $query;
00087                         
00088                         if (DB_DEBUG)
00089                                 $this->print_query();
00090                 }
00091                 
00096                 public function exec()
00097                 {
00098                         $this->connect();
00099                         $this->result = mysql_query($this->query, $this->link) or die("Error ({$this->query}): " . mysql_error());
00100                         
00101                         self::$queries_count++;
00102                         
00103                         return  $this->result;
00104                 }
00105                 
00110                 public function insert_id()
00111                 {
00112                         return mysql_insert_id($this->link());
00113                 }
00114                 
00120                 public function escape($value)
00121                 {
00122                         $this->connect();
00123                         return mysql_real_escape_string($value, $this->link);
00124                 }

00126
